original: Andersson, Ture Vilhelm, avdelningschef, Göteborg, f. 17/3/93 i Gbg av Claes A. o. Gerda Kristensson. G. 35 m. Anne-Marie Hauge. — Studrex. 13, språkstud. v. Gbgs högs,k., språk-o. affärsstud. i Engl. o. Frankr. Var. anst. i Nord. Linnefabr., Sjöförsäkr. A-B Gauthiod, Sv. Oljeslageri A-B, avdichef i Gbgs Hand:tidn. A-B. sed. 31. Sekr. i västsv. krets, av fören. Norden sed. 25, led. av fören. centr:-styr. sed. 43, led. av styr. f. Rederi A-B Gbg-Fredrikshavn sed. 35. Medl. av Publckl. sed. 31. RVOIkl.
translated: Andersson, Ture Vilhelm, Divisional Manager, Gothenburg, b. 17/3/93 in Gothenburg, son of Claes A. and Gerda Kristensson. Married in 1935 to Anne-Marie Hauge. - Studied at Stella Polytechnic in Gothenburg from 1913-1917, language studies at Gothenburg High School, language and business studies in England and France. Employed at Nordiska Linnefabrik, Sjöförsäkr. A-B Gauthiod, Sv. Oljeslageri A-B, Divisional Manager at Gothenburg's Trade Journal A-B since 1931. Secretary of the West Swedish Circle of the Nordic Association since 1925, member of the Association's Central Committee since 1943, member of the Board of Directors of Rederi A-B Gbg-Fredrikshavn since 1935. Member of the Publicity Committee since 1931. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.

memberOf.name: West Swedish Circle of the Nordic Association
